feed.title: Spark NLP
feed.subtitle: High Performance NLP with Apache Spark

entry.title: Translate Austro-Asiatic languages to English Pipeline

link.title: Translate Austro-Asiatic languages to English Pipeline

entry.content:
Description

Marian is an efficient, free Neural Machine Translation framework written in pure C++ with minimal dependencies. It is mainly being developed by the Microsoft Translator team. Many academic (most notably the University of Edinburgh and in the past the Adam Mickiewicz University in Poznań) and commercial contributors help with its development. It is currently the engine behind the Microsoft Translator Neural Machine Translation services and being deployed by many companies, organizations and research projects (see below for an incomplete list).

        source languages: aav

        target languages: en

Live Demo Open in Colab Download

How to use

from sparknlp.pretrained import PretrainedPipeline 
pipeline = PretrainedPipeline("translate_aav_en", lang = "xx") 
pipeline.annotate("Your sentence to translate!")


import com.johnsnowlabs.nlp.pretrained.PretrainedPipeline
val pipeline = new PretrainedPipeline("translate_aav_en", lang = "xx")
pipeline.annotate("Your sentence to translate!")


import nlu
text = ["text to translate"]
translate_df = nlu.load('xx.Austro-Asiatic languages.translate_to.English').predict(text, output_level='sentence')
translate_df

Model Information

Model Name: translate_aav_en
Type: pipeline
Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.1.0+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Language: xx

Data Source

https://huggingface.co/Helsinki-NLP/opus-mt-aav-en

Included Models

  • DocumentAssembler
  • SentenceDetectorDLModel
  • MarianTransformer
entry.summary: Description Marian is an efficient, free Neural Machine Translation framework written in pure C++ with minimal dependencies. It is mainly being developed by the Microsoft Translator team. Many academic (most notably the University of Edinburgh and in the past the Adam Mickiewicz University in Poznań) and commercial contributors help with its development. It is currently the engine behind the Microsoft Translator Neural Machine Translation services and being deployed by many companies, organizations and research projects (see below for an incomplete list). source languages: aav target languages: en Live Demo Open in Colab Download How to use PythonScalaNLU from sparknlp.pretrained import PretrainedPipeline pipeline = PretrainedPipeline("translate_aav_en", lang = "xx") pipeline.annotate("Your sentence to translate!") import com.johnsnowlabs.nlp.pretrained.PretrainedPipeline val pipeline = new PretrainedPipeline("translate_aav_en", lang = "xx") pipeline.annotate("Your sentence to translate!") import nlu text = ["text to translate"] translate_df = nlu.load('xx.Austro-Asiatic languages.translate_to.English').predict(text, output_level='sentence') translate_df Model Information Model Name: translate_aav_en Type: pipeline Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.1.0+ License: Open Source Edition: Official Language: xx Data Source https://huggingface.co/Helsinki-NLP/opus-mt-aav-en Included Models DocumentAssembler SentenceDetectorDLModel MarianTransformer

entry.title: Translate Argentine Sign Language to Spanish Pipeline

link.title: Translate Argentine Sign Language to Spanish Pipeline

entry.content:
Description

Marian is an efficient, free Neural Machine Translation framework written in pure C++ with minimal dependencies. It is mainly being developed by the Microsoft Translator team. Many academic (most notably the University of Edinburgh and in the past the Adam Mickiewicz University in Poznań) and commercial contributors help with its development. It is currently the engine behind the Microsoft Translator Neural Machine Translation services and being deployed by many companies, organizations and research projects (see below for an incomplete list).

        source languages: aed

        target languages: es

Live Demo Open in Colab Download

How to use

from sparknlp.pretrained import PretrainedPipeline 
pipeline = PretrainedPipeline("translate_aed_es", lang = "xx") 
pipeline.annotate("Your sentence to translate!")


import com.johnsnowlabs.nlp.pretrained.PretrainedPipeline
val pipeline = new PretrainedPipeline("translate_aed_es", lang = "xx")
pipeline.annotate("Your sentence to translate!")


import nlu
text = ["text to translate"]
translate_df = nlu.load('xx.Argentine Sign Language.translate_to.Spanish').predict(text, output_level='sentence')
translate_df

Model Information

Model Name: translate_aed_es
Type: pipeline
Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.1.0+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Language: xx

Data Source

https://huggingface.co/Helsinki-NLP/opus-mt-aed-es

Included Models

  • DocumentAssembler
  • SentenceDetectorDLModel
  • MarianTransformer

entry.title: Translate Afrikaans to German Pipeline
entry.content:
Description

Marian is an efficient, free Neural Machine Translation framework written in pure C++ with minimal dependencies. It is mainly being developed by the Microsoft Translator team. Many academic (most notably the University of Edinburgh and in the past the Adam Mickiewicz University in Poznań) and commercial contributors help with its development. It is currently the engine behind the Microsoft Translator Neural Machine Translation services and being deployed by many companies, organizations and research projects (see below for an incomplete list).

        source languages: af

        target languages: de

Live Demo Open in Colab Download

How to use

from sparknlp.pretrained import PretrainedPipeline 
pipeline = PretrainedPipeline("translate_af_de", lang = "xx") 
pipeline.annotate("Your sentence to translate!")


import com.johnsnowlabs.nlp.pretrained.PretrainedPipeline
val pipeline = new PretrainedPipeline("translate_af_de", lang = "xx")
pipeline.annotate("Your sentence to translate!")


import nlu
text = ["text to translate"]
translate_df = nlu.load('xx.Afrikaans.translate_to.German').predict(text, output_level='sentence')
translate_df

Model Information

Model Name: translate_af_de
Type: pipeline
Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.1.0+
License: Open Source
Edition: Official
Language: xx

Data Source

https://huggingface.co/Helsinki-NLP/opus-mt-af-de

Included Models

  • DocumentAssembler
  • SentenceDetectorDLModel
  • MarianTransformer

It is currently the engine behind the Microsoft Translator Neural Machine Translation services and being deployed by many companies, organizations and research projects (see below for an incomplete list).

Description

Marian is an efficient, free Neural Machine Translation framework written in pure C++ with minimal dependencies. It is mainly being developed by the Microsoft Translator team. Many academic (most notably the University of Edinburgh and in the past the Adam Mickiewicz University in Poznań) and commercial contributors help with its development. It is currently the engine behind the Microsoft Translator Neural Machine Translation services and being deployed by many companies, organizations and research projects (see below for an incomplete list).

        source languages: af

        target languages: fi

Live Demo Open in Colab Download

How to use

from sparknlp.pretrained import PretrainedPipeline 
pipeline = PretrainedPipeline("translate_af_fi", lang = "xx") 
pipeline.annotate("Your sentence to translate!")

Compatibility: Spark NLP 3.1.0+
License: Open Source

Language: xx
